headline: Meta AI Chip Deals Reshape Costs As Shares Trade Below Targets
summary: Meta Platforms (NasdaqGS:META) has agreed to multi-billion-dollar, multi-year deals to expand its AI infrastructure. The company signed a major supply partnership with AMD for AI chips. Meta also entered a large lease agreement for access to Google TPUs. The company is reducing its focus on in-house chip development after technical setbacks. These arrangements include multi-gigawatt hardware commitments and performance-linked equity components. Meta Platforms, best known for Facebook,...

headline: Consumer Tech News (Feb 23-27): US–Taiwan Trade Tensions Escalates, Amazon Invests $12B In US & More
summary: Mark Kelly emphasized the rapid workplace impact of artificial intelligence and called for "practical rules" that protect families while preserving innovation. U.S.–Taiwan trade tensions escalated after the Supreme Court struck down former President Donald Trump's emergency tariff authority. Trump responded by criticizing Taiwan's semiconductor dominance and proposing new tariffs.

headline: Linux Foundation Announces OCUDU Ecosystem Foundation to Accelerate Open Source AI-RAN Innovation
summary: Mobile World Congress 2026 -- The Linux Foundation (LF), the world's leading home for open collaboration on open source software, hardware, standards, and data, today announced the formation of the Open Centralized Unit Distributed Unit (OCUDU) Ecosystem Foundation, an open collaboration hub dedicated to building, scaling, and sustaining the OCUDU technical project assets and leveraging them to establish a foundational reference platform for RAN including AI based algorithms and solutions. headline: Super Micro Links High Density AI Servers With Grid Responsive Data Centers
summary: Super Micro Computer (NasdaqGS: SMCI) has launched a high density AI focused MicroBlade server platform powered by AMD EPYC 4005 processors for cloud and edge workloads. In addition, the company ran a live grid integrated AI trial with CPower Energy and Bentaus, showing its servers responding to real time electricity demand signals. Taken together, these updates link SMCI's hardware roadmap with practical use cases in energy flexible data center operations. At a share price of $32.39, Super...
